page.title: 17A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: A TYPICAL DAY FOR ME WOULD BE TO GO AND HAVE BREAKFAST AT 7.15a.m. I HAVE CEREAL AND TOAST. THEN MY MUM DRIVES ME TO SCHOOL IN THE MINI. WHEN WE GET THERE WE HAVE A PLAY TIME AND GO INTO SCHOOL AT 8.50. WE DO SILENT READING FIRST, THEN WE DO MATHS AND LATER ON GROUPWORK. IN GROUPWORK MR. BEEVER GIVES US A SUBJECT TO DO,IT MIGHT BE MATHS,ENGLISH,SCIENCE OR ART AND CRAFT WE HAVE LUNCH AT 12.00,AND RESTART SCHOOL AT 1.15 AFTER LUNCH WE DO GAMES OR P.E. WHERE WE PLAY ROUNDERS OR OTHER GAMES. THEN WE HAVE HAND WRITING AND GO OUT TO PLAY AT 2.20 WHEN WE COME IN AFTER PLAY WE MAY HAVE A STORY OR ENGLISH. WE GO HOME AT 3.30. WE HAVE 4 PEOPLE IN OUR FAMILY,MY DAD WORKS IN LONDON,MY MUM IS A HOUSE WIFE,AND WE LIVE IN SHATTON NEAR BAMFORD.
